name: Meher
bio: I am a 9-year-old "cub" who loves robotics. I am in 4th grade at Creekside Elementary School in Sammamish. When I’m not doing robotics, I love to read and write stories, play with my friends and animals (especially dogs and cats!) My friends and I enjoy building safe homes in the wilderness for wild animals. We also spend time outside exploring nature. I enjoy dancing—especially contemporary and hip-hop. I love basketball as well! I am on the Skyline girls basketball team.

name: Aradhya
bio: I am a 9-year-old "cub" who loves robotics. I am in 4th grade at Creekside Elementary School in Sammamish. Outside of robotics, I enjoy dancing to bollywood songs and playing basketball with my friends. I'm also an avid Seahawks fan!

name: Avinash
bio: I am a 10-year-old "cub" who loves robotics. I am in 5th grade at Creekside Elementary School in Sammamish. Outside of robotics, I love dancing, basketball and singing. I love to spend time with my friends!
